subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Football at Fenway. That’s what the organizers called Wednesday’s summer exhibition in which A.S. Roma defeated Liverpool, 2-1, with Michael Bradley of the United States scoring the first goal.
snippet: Football at Fenway. That’s what the organizers called Wednesday’s summer exhibition in which A.S. Roma defeated Liverpool, 2-1, with Michael Bradley of the United States scoring the first goal.
